name: Haunter

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dream Eater
attacks.text: You can't use this attack unless the Defending Pokémon is Asleep.

flavorText: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

strengths: Dream Eater does 50 for just 2 energy
weaknesses: Dream Eater requires defender to be Asleep
Defender may wake up before Dream Eater
counters: Full Heal - Wakes up Asleep Pokemon

competitiveHistory: Haunter was a unique attacker with strong synergy between Hypnosis and Dream Eater. The no-weakness trait was valuable, and 50 damage for 2 energy was efficient when the combo worked.

rulings.ruling: Hypnosis automatically puts the Defending Pokemon to sleep - no coin flip.
Dream Eater cannot be used unless the Defending Pokemon is currently Asleep.
If the Defending Pokemon wakes up between turns, you cannot use Dream Eater on your turn.
